member.name: P:SMT.Alentejo.InstanceHealthService.InstanceHealthService._WindowsIsReady
member.summary: This method calls the core code that checks the instance console output to see if windows is ready on this instance. Once the core method returns true once it is no longer called.

member.name: M:SMT.Alentejo.InstanceHealthService.InstanceHealthService.OnCustomCommand(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allow changes in the timer interval.

member.name: M:SMT.Alentejo.InstanceHealthService.InstanceHealthService.RetrieveApp(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the path to the primary executable.

member.name: M:SMT.Alentejo.InstanceHealthService.InstanceHealthService.KillProcesses(System.String)
member.summary: Kills all processes of this name.
